title: Smurf

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
He's an obvious smurf that AFKs in about 1/4 of his games, and rolls when he actually tries.
This is why people get perma banned for foul language due to frustration with players such as this.

replies.body: If someone is AFKing or trolling your games, always make sure to report them in the postgame lobby. Those reports send over the game as well so we have something to investigate.

I got banned for 14 days for someone trolling my game and expressing my anger, apparently Riot wants to cater to the snowflakes of the world and make sure no one gets offended by slurs in their games but its perfectly ok to be a troll in ranked and ruin 4 other peoples games and get away with it.
